p: Apart from martensite transformation, some austenite was retained in FGHAZ because of the fast continuous cooling transformation (shown in Figure 4), as well as the shorter transformation temperature range. The volume fraction of retained austenite in FGHAZ was measured to be 9~11% by XRD, while only 0.5~1.2% retained austenite in CGHAZ ( Figure 8a,b).
